title: Is by leaving everything we will meet with god? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your beliefs Most of the religions talks about cycle of rebirth until the soul becomes purified from sins and unites with Him If you go by Islamic beliefs,Non_ believers in God won't meet God.THey had denied His existence when alive,rejected His presence and instead of the usual exclamation as “ Oh God! they exclaimed as” Oh Gosh!” Why would God honour them by His SIGHT?.
